verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>

"This<WH2088> is the statute<WH2708> of the law<WH8451> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> has commanded,<WH6680> saying,<WH559> 'Speak<WH1696> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> that they bring<WH3947> you an unblemished<WH8549> red<WH122> heifer<WH6499> in which<WH834> is no<WH369> defect,<WH9249> [and] on which<WH834> a yoke<WH5923> has never<WH3808> been placed.<WH5927>

'And you shall give<WH5414> it to Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and it shall be brought<WH3318> outside<WH413> <WH4480> <WH2351> the camp<WH4264> and be slaughtered<WH7819> in his presence.<WH6440>

'Next Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> some<WH4480> of its blood<WH1818> with his finger,<WH676> and sprinkle<WH5137> some<WH4480> of its blood<WH1818> toward<WH413> the front<WH6440> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150> seven<WH7651> times.<WH6471>
'Then the heifer<WH6499> shall be burned<WH8313> in his sight;<WH5869> its hide<WH5785> and its flesh<WH1320> and its blood,<WH1818> with its refuse,<WH6569> shall be burned.<WH8313>

'And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> cedar<WH730> wood<WH6086> and hyssop<WH231> and scarlet<WH8144> [material,] and cast<WH7993> it into the midst<WH8432> of the burning<WH8316> heifer.<WH6499>

'The priest<WH3548> shall then wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> his body<WH1320> in water, and afterward<WH310> come<WH935> into the camp,<WH4264> but the priest<WH3548> shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'The one who burns<WH8313> it shall also wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> in water<WH4325> and bathe<WH7364> his body<WH1320> in water,<WH4325> and shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'Now a man<WH376> who is clean<WH2889> shall gather<WH622> up the ashes<WH665> of the heifer<WH6499> and deposit<WH5117> them outside<WH4480> <WH2351> the camp<WH4264> in a clean<WH2889> place,<WH4725> and the congregation<WH5712> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall keep<WH4931> it as water<WH4325> to remove impurity;<WH5079> it is purification<WH9128> from sin.<WH9128>

'And the one who gathers<WH622> the ashes<WH665> of the heifer<WH6499> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening;<WH6153> and it shall be a perpetual<WH5769> statute<WH2708> to the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> and to the alien<WH1616> who sojourns<WH1481> among<WH8432> them.
'The one who touches<WH5060> the corpse<WH4191> of any<WH3605> person<WH5315> <WH120> shall be unclean<WH2930> for seven<WH7651> days.<WH3117>

'That one<WH1931> shall purify<WH2398> himself from uncleanness<WH2398> with the water on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> and on the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> [and then] he shall be clean;<WH2891> but if<WH518> he does not purify<WH2398> himself on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> and on the seventh<WH7637> day,<WH3117> he shall not be clean.<WH2891>

'Anyone<WH3605> who touches<WH5060> a corpse,<WH4191> the body<WH5315> of a man<WH120> who<WH834> has died,<WH4191> and does not purify<WH2398> himself, defiles<WH2930> the tabernacle<WH4908> of the Lord;<WH3068> and that person<WH5315> shall be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from Israel.<WH3478> Because<WH3588> the water<WH4325> for impurity<WH5079> was not sprinkled<WH2236> on him, he shall be unclean;<WH2931> his uncleanness<WH2932> is still<WH5750> on him.

'This<WH2088> is the law<WH8451> when<WH3588> a man<WH120> dies<WH4191> in a tent:<WH168> everyone<WH3605> who comes<WH935> into the tent<WH168> and everyone<WH3605> who<WH834> is in the tent<WH168> shall be unclean<WH2930> for seven<WH7651> days.<WH3117>
'And every<WH3605> open<WH6605> vessel,<WH3627> which<WH834> has<WH369> no<WH369> covering<WH9489> tied<WH6616> down<WH6616> on it, shall be unclean.<WH2931>

'Also, anyone<WH3605> who<WH834> in the open<WH6440> field<WH7704> touches<WH5060> one<WH2491> who<WH2491> has been slain<WH2491> with a sword<WH2719> or<WH176> who has died<WH4191> [naturally,] or<WH176> a human<WH120> bone<WH6106> or<WH176> a grave,<WH6913> shall be unclean<WH2930> for seven<WH7651> days.<WH3117>

'Then for the unclean<WH2931> [person] they shall take<WH3947> some<WH4480> of the ashes<WH6083> of the burnt<WH8316> purification<WH9128> from sin<WH9128> and flowing<WH2416> water<WH4325> shall be added<WH5414> to them in a vessel.<WH3627>

'And a clean<WH2889> person<WH376> shall take<WH3947> hyssop<WH231> and dip<WH2881> [it] in the water,<WH4325> and sprinkle<WH5137> [it] on the tent<WH168> and on all<WH3605> the furnishings<WH3627> and on the persons<WH5315> who<WH834> were there,<WH8033> and on the one who touched<WH5060> the bone<WH6106> or<WH176> the one<WH2491> slain<WH2491> or<WH176> the one dying<WH4191> [naturally] or<WH176> the grave.<WH6913>

'Then the clean<WH2889> [person] shall sprinkle<WH5137> on the unclean<WH2931> on the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> and on the seventh<WH7637> day;<WH3117> and on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> he shall purify<WH2398> him from uncleanness,<WH2398> and he shall wash<WH3526> his clothes<WH899> and bathe<WH7364> [himself] in water<WH4325> and shall be clean<WH2891> by evening.<WH6153>

'But the man<WH376> who<WH834> is unclean<WH2930> and does not purify<WH2398> himself from uncleanness,<WH2398> that person<WH5315> shall be cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> from the midst<WH8432> of the assembly,<WH6951> because<WH3588> he has defiled<WH2930> the sanctuary<WH4720> of the Lord;<WH3068> the water<WH4325> for impurity<WH5079> has not been sprinkled<WH2236> on him, he is unclean.<WH2931>

'So it shall be a perpetual<WH5769> statute<WH2708> for them. And he who sprinkles<WH5137> the water<WH4325> for impurity<WH5079> shall wash<WH3526> his clothes,<WH899> and he who touches<WH5060> the water<WH4325> for impurity<WH5079> shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>

'Furthermore, anything<WH3605> that the unclean<WH2931> [person<WH5315>] touches<WH5060> shall be unclean;<WH2930> and the person who touches<WH5060> [it] shall be unclean<WH2930> until<WH5704> evening.<WH6153>' "
